shortdesc.ph: Enables the network connection quality test.

section.p:
This method tests the quality of the users' network connections and is disabled by default. By default, this function is disabled. This method applies to the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` channel profile.
Before a user joins a channel or before an audience switches to a host, call this method to check the uplink network quality.
This method consumes additional network traffic, and hence may affect communication quality.

Regardless of the scenario, enabling this method will consume network traffic and affect the call quality. After receiving the callback, the user must call to stop the test, and then join the channel or switch to the host.

ul.li: Do not use this method at the same time.
Otherwise, the callback may be interrupted by other methods, and hence may not be triggered.
A host should not call this method after joining a channel (when in a call).

After calling this method to check the network quality before joining the channel, the SDK will occupy the bandwidth of one video, and the bit rate is the same as the bit rate set in. After joining a channel, the SDK will automatically stop bandwidth usage regardless of whether it is called.
